# deeporigin

![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/deeporigin)

This repository contains the `deeporigin` Python client,
which allows you to interact with Deep Origin from Python.

> [!WARNING]  
> The `deeporigin` client is under active development. Features
> may change or be removed.


## Documentation

Please look at our docs for information on how to install and use this:

https://client-docs.deeporigin.io/
